secret_rule: Only items that are named after a person or place can be brought to the picnic.

conversation.content: To start, here are some examples of items you can bring: "Caesar salad" and "Parisian baguette".
Player: Can I bring Russian vodka?
Player: Can I bring German beer?
No, you cannot bring Japanese sushi.
Player: Can I bring American hotdog?
Player: Can I bring Mexican tacos?
Player: Can I bring British tea?
Player: Can I bring Spanish paella?
Yes, you can bring Indian curry.
The rule is: You can only bring food items that are named after the place they originated from.
